content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I successfully executed Python code to calculate the average of a list of numbers and wrote test cases to ensure the function works correctly. I also wrote the code to a file named "average.py" and the test cases to a file named "test_average.py". Both files were written successfully and all tests passed. Additionally, I executed the "google" command to search for "international law research resources" and received multiple links. Lastly, I attempted to use the "get_text_summary" command to summarize an article on climate change, but received an error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'atlas_notes.txt', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "atlas_notes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
